decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments not to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment be refused.
description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 22/01104/FUL (Erection of 2no. x new semi-detached dwellings with basements) to remove the basement floor and addition of 2no rear windows.
